contents.Text: The favourites is a menu to save searches/artists/songs permanently.
Insider Tip: You can queue/shuffle a entire category but pressing "Alt+X" to enable [[[button:Multi Shuffle Mode][../Search/Multi Shuffle Mode]]]then left clicking on a category or multiple
To make a new category go see [[[button:Dropdown][Dropdown]]]
[[[warning:NOTE]]] You can use [[[strong:Inline Editing]]] via [[[strong:middle clicking]]] on a category to rename it
Used to Remove/Add Categories and add new entries to the current selected category
Displays the searches saved in the selected category
Clicking on an item searches it again
Right clicking deletes it the same way it does in [[[button:History][../History]]]
Middle clicking on a value in the [[[strong:Dropdown Body]]] will open it in inline editing mode
Press enter to save the changes
Middle clicking again will discard the changes
